items.title: Introduction

items.text: There is <z>none</z> of research project <z>in progress or done</z> already.

items.text: Currently, studio's budget is <z>too tight to afford</z> any equipment.

items.text: Currently, studio's products are <z>only virtual (page templates)</z>. Studio cannot produce and provide anything innovative and solid.

sections.title: Our Vision

lines.text: <z>Soaring through</z> the high sky by wind,
<z>Looking down</z> the vast rivers and mountains.

content: Propriator intends to create a more interactive and fashionable page, i.e. studio platform,
in order to make pretty comfortable environment for visitors being interested in our studio's work, facilities, and products.
Certainly, it may take Propriator several years to finish this project.
As above points mention, Propriator has no enough budget and professional level to build such well-equipped studio.
Please let Propriator find an employer and keep his academic route going first, because Propriator has even not obtained Master Degree yet.
But building a studio is always Propriator's dream, Propriator would try his best to make it!
In short, please stay tuned! During this route, Propriator could gradually fill with content in this page!

items.title: Convex Optimization
items.text: Including convex optimization's basic concepts and methods, which are applied to robot control and navigation problems.

items.title: Differential Geometry
items.text: Including differential geometry's basic concepts and methods, which are applied to robot motion kinematics and dynamics problems.

items.title: Stochastic Process
items.text: Including stochastic process's basic concepts and methods, which are applied to robot state estimation problems.

items.title: Excursion Studio Personal Homepage Ver.2 (ESPH-V2)
items.text: A React-based personal homepage template, which is used to show personal career and experiences.

items.title: Excursion Studio Research Project Page (ESRPP)
items.text: A React-based research project page template, which is used to show research project's detailed information.

items.title: Excursion Studio Personal Homepage (ESPH) <z>(Outdated)</z>
items.text: A native JavaScript-based personal homepage template, which is used to show personal career and experiences. Page performance is lower than V2 version, but it is stable and reliable.
